name: Smoke: 1 unit, 1 type, hourly, 1h cycle
description: Predictable smoke test. Deterministic hourly demand (0h..7h) to VMU-1. Deterministic 1-hour mission cycle (pre/post/turn/mount = 0, flight = 1.0). Expected: With ≥1 aircraft, ≥1 pilot, and ≥1 SO continuously available at VMU-1, Request=8, Start=8, Complete=8, Rejected≈0. All missions finish within 8h horizon.
questions: Does the engine produce 8 requests and (with sufficient resources) 8 completions over 8 hours?
Are there zero rejections when at least one full set of resources is available?
